name: Chart
description: A widget that provide a chart to display historized data
incompatibilityDifferential: Differential display and range configuration are incompatible

interval.name: Default interval of the chart
interval.description: Used to change the first displayed interval of the chart

oneAxis.name: Only one axis for all series
oneAxis.description: It allows you to create one axis for all series, with this option, series could be compare with the same scale.

customYAxisMinMax.name: Manually set min and max of y axis
customYAxisMinMax.description: Enabling this section allow you to set the min and max of the chart Y-axis. If disabled, min and max will be automatically computed. This section is active only when the option unique axis is selected

item.name: Plot
item.description: This section describe the configuration of a plot

source.name: Data to display
source.description: Choose the data of a device to display on the chart

color.name: Color of the plot
color.description: Permit to change the color of the plot

differentialDisplay.name: Differential display
differentialDisplay.description: The display show the difference between each points (useful for cumulative rain measurement, ...). This option is ignore for boolean and enum values.

periodtype.name: period value configuration
periodtype.description: the value used for computed period (example : for temperature, 'average' should be used. For rain drops, 'maximum' match the reality)

PlotType.name: Plot Type
PlotType.description: choose beetween following plot type. Range are not displayed in hour interval
